title: The JMAPACCESS Extension for IMAP
source: Email mailstore and eXtensions To Revise or Amend
abstract:
This document defines an IMAP extension to let clients know that the
messages in this IMAP server are also available via the JSON Meta
Application Protocol (JMAP), and how. It is intended for clients that
want to migrate gradually to JMAP or use JMAP extensions within an
IMAP client.
